items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sexy and comfortable
items.body: Great panties. Fits very well and comfortable. Beautiful colors Read more
items.author: Miss CA

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfy and soft
items.body: Very soft comfortable material. Packaging is nice. Everything is vacuum sealed. Very thoughtful company every package I have gotten included a hand written not on a card of some sort. Very satisfied with this purchase. The material quality is amazing. Super stretchy.they do roll down a little bit in the front but that's probably because I don't have a flat belly. I love the colors. Functional practical comfortable. I love them. Read more
items.author: Clarissa

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Super cute, wanted more tummy control
items.body: These were super cute. Colors are beautiful underwear as described Lacey bottom, top as cotton. Packaging is absolutely beautiful. Might try different style I would still recommend. I just was looking for a little more tummy control. Read more
items.author: Consuelo Mcdaniel

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars SHE Underwear Lace Boy Shorts, 5 Pack
items.body: Excellent Value - Comfortable and True to Size I'm very happy with this 5-pack of lace boy shorts, especially at under $12! They are absolutely worth the price. Fit: These run true to size and fit great. No issues with sizing at all. Comfort: The material is very soft and feels great to wear They stretch very well. It does not roll up.I was concerned the lace might be scratchy, but it's actually quite comfortable. Colors: The colors are beautiful and look just like the pictures. Value: For the price, you really can't beat this set. Getting 5 pairs of comfortable, good-quality underwear for under $12 is a fantastic deal. Cute packaging. I would definitely recommend these to anyone looking for affordable, comfortable everyday underwear! Read more
items.author: Paubla Maya

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love these
items.body: These are Beautiful and sexy and true to size so comfortable and soft Definitely will buy again. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute, Comfortable & Sexy!!
items.body: These panties are the bomb!!! When I got this order yesterday I placed another one with different colors. They fit so good. Love the stretch and most definitely the wide waistband. Finally, a sexy lace panty where it don't roll down. The price was great! Love the cotton material. I purchased a large size with my weight 170lbs with room. They are breathable and comfortable. I didn't feel all bulged up and tight in the stomach area (lil round in the belly). Read more
items.author: Lady T

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Sizing is off
items.body: These are cute but the sizing is off. They’re a lot bigger than stated (at least for the size XS). The quality feels so-so. The cotton crotch lining was not stitched very well and started to roll up into a thin strip since the sides were not stitched down, causing uncomfortable wedgies. Read more
items.author: KTKB

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sexy comfort
items.body: Beautiful, sexy, comfortable panties. Packaged very nicely and the material and size and color are all exact. I will be buying from this company again for sure. I also bought my daughter a different style same company and super pleased with that option as well! Good material and made very well, not itchy or this lace very nice. Read more
items.author: April B.

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: C-multicolor(5 Pack), A-multicolor(5 Pack), F-white(5 Pack), D-multicolor(5 Pack), B-black(5 Pack). If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
